title: Critical Thinking Enhancement Project Using Online Argumentation Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Academic Paper Analysis Skills and Smartphone Utilization Competency
context.additional_context: Critical discussions on scientific topics using collaborative argumentation (AM) tools in a smartphone-centric limited technological environment. Learning outcomes are measured through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners structure scientific arguments from three or more perspectives using an online argument mapping tool.
Learners improve their critical thinking level by two or more stages through six online discussion activities.
Learners apply three or more critical thinking processing patterns (recognition-understanding, evaluation-re-recognition, creation-understanding) during collaborative argument mapping.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
